mapper.insert: insert into festival(fcode, fname, fphone, fimage, fsdate, fedate, fcontent, fprice1, fprice2) values (#{fcode}, #{fname},#{fphone},#{fimage},#{fsdate}, #{fedate}, #{fcontent}, #{fprice1}, #{fprice2})
mapper.update: update festival set fname=#{fname}, fcontent=#{fcontent}, fprice1=#{fprice1},fprice2=#{fprice2} where fcode=#{fcode}
